alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 24 at 6:11AM AKDT until March 26 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow, freezing rain, and blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. Visibility could drop to near zero at times. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Large snow drifts will form. A glaze of ice could make slippery travel conditions. Strong winds could cause damage to buildings and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow will develop early Saturday. The strongest winds will be Saturday afternoon and saturday night. Freezing rain is possible Saturday afternoon into Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
